entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You successfully escorted the officer back.
entries.journal_entry_description: You have been instructed to escort an officer back in from a hyperspace point.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use the space terminal to launch into space.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have been instructed to escort a ship from one of the hyperspace points.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Serissu to report your failure.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: You Failed Your Mission, Return to Serissu
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Report to Serissu of your success.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Land and Report back to Serissu
